{{cpp/numeric/random/student_t_distribution/title|n}}
{{cpp/numeric/random/student_t_distribution/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|1=
RealType n() const;
}}

Returns the {{math|n}} distribution parameter (number of the degrees of freedom) the distribution was constructed with. The default value is {{c|1.0}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Floating point value identifying the degrees of freedom of the distribution.
